productAdvantages.title: Product Advantages
productAdvantages.description: PT. KONTAKPERKASA FUTURES is a futures brokerage company engaged in commodity trading and is consistent in its mission to develop the investment climate in Indonesia.

advantages.title: Capital Efficiency
advantages.description: In trading using Margin Trading (margin funds), investors can conduct large transactions with relatively small capital. With a minimum fund of 10% of the total transaction value, 100% capital is not required.

advantages.title: Transaction Flexibility
advantages.description: Two-way transactions allow investors to take advantage of opportunities whether the market is moving up or down.

advantages.title: Highly Fluctuating Price Movements
advantages.description: Large daily price movements ranging from 100-500 points provide significant profit opportunities with a contract size of US $5/point and only charged a transaction fee/Fee of 3 (Three) points plus 11% VAT.

advantages.title: High Liquidity
advantages.description: This product has a very high level of liquidity, allowing investors to conduct buy and sell transactions at any time during market hours, without having to queue at market prices.

investmentTypes.title: Investment Types
investmentTypes.description: There are two types of investments:

fixedRate.title: a. Fixed Rate
points: Protected from the risk of loss due to USD/Rupiah fluctuations

floatingRate.title: b. Floating Rate
points: US $1 = US $1 (according to USD to Rupiah exchange rate)
No fees for opening and withdrawing USD funds, either partially or in full
